rules.name: Formulario_1
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 9 OR 10 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15) AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 11 )
rules.label: Formulario 1

rules.name: Formulario_2
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 2
rules.label: Formulario 2

rules.name: Formulario_3
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 2
rules.label: Formulario 3

rules.name: Formulario_4
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 2
rules.label: Formulario 4

rules.name: Formulario_5
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 2
rules.label: Formulario 5

rules.name: Formulario_6
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 )
rules.label: Formulario 6

rules.name: Formulario_7
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11) AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 )
rules.label: Formulario 7

rules.name: Formulario_8
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 2
rules.label: Formulario 8

rules.name: Formulario_9
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11) AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 )
rules.label: Formulario 9

rules.name: Formulario_10
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 5) OR (3 AND (4 OR 9) AND 5) OR ((4 OR 9) AND 5 AND 6) OR ((7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 2 AND 5)
rules.label: Formulario 10

rules.name: Formulario_11
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 5) OR (3 AND (4 OR 9) AND 5) OR ((4 OR 9) AND 5 AND 6) OR ((7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 2 AND 5)
rules.label: Formulario 11

rules.name: Formulario_12
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10) AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 )
rules.label: Formulario 12

rules.name: Formulario_13
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 )
rules.label: Formulario 13
